nasiKlienci.title: Our Clients
nasiKlienci.subtitle: Companies already saving time through automation

q1.question: How much does implementation cost?
q1.answer: Cost depends on project complexity and specialization. After a free consultation, we provide a detailed quote. A typical ChatBot project costs 5-15k PLN, Voice Agent 10-20k PLN.

q2.question: How long does implementation take?
q2.answer: Standard implementation takes 2 weeks from accepting the offer. This includes configuration, testing, and training your team.

q3.question: Do I need a technical team?
q3.answer: No. We handle everything from A to Z. You just provide us with knowledge about your company and processes.

q4.question: Can I test before buying?
q4.answer: Yes! We prepare a demo tailored to your industry that you can test for 7 days for free.

q5.question: What if something stops working?
q5.answer: We provide full technical support. We monitor systems 24/7 and respond to problems in real-time.
